instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3115: What is 820-3115? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B defect gpu?
threads.message:
hi got a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-b green light turning on but only high fan hot gpu and white screen ? is the gpu death??
greetings triple6r

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B defect gpu?
threads.message:
These have no GPU......

Voltage at L9004 both sides? Is it booting OSX?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B defect gpu?
threads.message: (L9004) i got 3.3 on pin 1 and pin 2 0,311 i try extern display from my pc and i got a question mark folder but this hdd is empty and with extern display still high fan spin

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B defect gpu?
threads.message: You already gave the answer. Read back your post and tell me what is wrong.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B defect gpu?
[SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B defect gpu?
threads.message: Measure it and then think why L9004 could fry as it does not "just" do this. Probably a short to GND on the LCD connector side, so check for that before replacing it.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B defect gpu?
threads.message:
i know what happend with this board had backlight problem i replace f9700 t i put this board back in a liquid damaged Lcd cable body and f*ckt up now already 2 boards this stupid mistake 
a measure pin2 of lcd connector to ground i got 35.90 k ohms ?

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B defect gpu?
threads.message: Check with plugged in LCD if there is a short on pin 2/3. If not then it is safe to replace L9004.

threads.title: [SOLVED]<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3115</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-B defect gpu?
threads.message: This can be markt as solved- changed L9004 and new lcd cable and fixt thnxs duke
